name: Ring King (itch)
description:
This soon-to-be royal needs to go through harsh training before he can rule it's kingdom. Do you have what it takes to help them learn the ancient art of CircleJump?

This was part of a self-imposed week-long GameJam. This is my first game, so let me know what you think! I have many more ideas for Ring King, but I will come back to them later when I become a stronger programmer. 

This was made with Godot, Aseprite, and Audacity.  

  • A/D or left/right to move 
  • Space to jump
  • W/J/Up to Circle Jump
  • V/K to cancel rotation
  • Esc/P to pause
